original_text: God helped their army to fight against their enemies. He put the Hagrites under their power, as well as the other people who fought with them. The soldiers of Manasseh, Reuben and Gad called out to God for help during the battle. God answered their prayers because they trusted him.
korean_text: 도우심을 입었으므로 하갈 사람과 그들과 함께 있는 자들이 다 그들의 손에 패하였으니 이는 그들이 싸울 때에 하나님께 의뢰하고 부르짖으므로 하나님이 그들에게 응답하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: He put the Hagrites under their power
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 하그리 사람들을 그들의 권세 아래 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as the other people who fought with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 싸운 다른 사람들도 마찬가지였습니다

sentences.original_text: The soldiers of Manasseh, Reuben and Gad called out to God
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세, 르우벤, 갓의 군사들이 하나님께 부르짖었습니다
